channel.title: Neopets First Refresher!

item.title: Neopets First Refresher!
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

hmmmm…a much simpler refresher is:

program Refresh;
begin
repeat
clickmouse(x,y,true); //i can't remember the coords, i kinda deleted the original
wait(500);
end.

although i definitely like you’re version better, much more human-like

item.title: Neopets First Refresher!
item.dc:creator: @boopyg boopyg
item.description:
@boopyg wrote:

[code]program RandomGetter;

Procedure randomcatch;
begin

writeln(‘starting procedure now’);
movemousesmooth(45,249);
clickmouse(45,249,true);
wait(2000);
movemousesmooth(1027,322);
movemousesmooth(85,283);
wait(250);
clickmouse(85,283,true);
wait(1027);
movemousesmooth(81,316);
clickmouse(81,316,true);
wait(1022);
movemousesmooth(74,356);
wait(23);
clickmouse(74,356,true);
end;
begin
repeat
randomcatch;
until(false)
end.[/code]

mwahahaha an evil way to get randoms!
very easy to make.
By the way, if anyone has my scripts from Kaitnieks, please give them to me.

boopy
